titles.title: Expressing disapproval of the revocation by President Biden of the Presidential permit for the Keystone XL pipeline.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure, and in addition to the Committees on Energy and Commerce, and Natural Resources, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

committee.name: House Energy and Commerce
committee.activity: Reported By, Markup By, Referred To

term.name: Presidents and presidential powers, Vice Presidents

bill.summary: This concurrent resolution expresses congressional disapproval of the revocation of the presidential permit for the Keystone XL pipeline. The permit authorized the TransCanada Keystone Pipeline to construct, connect, operate, and maintain the pipeline facilities in Phillips County, Montana, for the import of oil from Canada to the United States.
